resources.string:
1. If anyone wants to participate after the matches begin, they need to give the previous games' points which will be shared by the winners. 

2. Once your prediction is given no further changes will be allowed. If someone does not have active Internet or a friend with active internet, they can give their prediction via SMS/Call to their team. 

3. Your preferred team should be placed before 2:00 PM for the matches on that day. In case of someone does not update their prediction by 2:00 PM, the points will be deducted from him and it will be shared by the winners. 

4. Tied or weather affected games will be settled on the official match result if decided by Duckworth-Lewis (or equivalent), Super-Over or by other cricketing means. In the event of a tied match with no such decider, no points for all. In case NO STARTER due to weather or any other circumstances no points to all. 

5. Prediction of Tied matches are allowed. 

6.League games 30 points, Playoffs 100 and final is 200
